quote: Don’t sit down and wait for the opportunities to come. Get up and make them.
author: Madam C.J. Walker

quote: If you don’t build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
author: Dhirubhai Ambani

quote: What would you do if you weren’t afraid?
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: You have to be burning with an idea, or a problem, or a wrong that you want to right. If you’re not passionate enough from the start, you’ll never stick it out.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Dreams do not come true just because you dream them. It’s hard work that makes things happen. It’s hard work that creates change.
author: Shonda Rhime

quote: Do what you love and success will follow. Passion is the fuel behind a successful career.
author: Meg Whitman

quote: Don’t worry about failure. You only have to be right once.
author: Drew Houston

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Train people well enough so they can leave, treat them well enough so they don’t want to.
author: Richard Branson

quote: We entrepreneurs are loners, vagabonds, troublemakers. Success is simply a matter of finding and surrounding ourselves with those open-minded and clever souls who can take our insanity and put it to good use.
author: Anita Roddick

quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Don’t ever make decisions based on fear. Make decisions based on hope and possibility. Make decisions based on what should happen, not what shouldn’t.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: It’s important that leaders are consistent. You can change your mind, but change your mind against a consistent framework.
author: Indra Nooyi

quote: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does – that makes you a winner right there.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Dedicate yourself to a core set of values. Without them, you will never be able to find personal fulfillment, and you will never be able to lead effectively.
author: Kenneth Chenault

quote: Take risks. Failure is a stepping stone to success.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
author: Bill Gates

quote: If you want to grow you have to do something different from the majority of people.
author: Lakshmi Mittal

quote: The road to success is always under construction.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: If you push through that feeling of being scared, that feeling of taking risk, really amazing things can happen.
author: Marissa Mayer

quote: If you don’t like something, change it.  If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Longevity is a fleeting moment that lasts forever.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: When you undervalue what you do, the world will undervalue who you are.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Days are expensive. When you spend a day you have one less day to spend. So make sure you spend each one wisely.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: In the journey of entrepreneurship, tenacity of purpose is supreme.
author: Aliko Dangote

quote: Remain a lifelong student. Don’t lose that curiosity.
author: Indra Nooyi

quote: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
author: Estée Lauder

quote: It always seems impossible, until it is done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
author: Thomas Edison,

quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau
